result.purpose: Responsible for HMAC authentication, including configuration, signing, and validation.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating HMAC-related functionalities and tests in separate files.

pkg/crypto/hmac/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration settings for HMAC authentication.

pkg/crypto/hmac/funcs.go.purpose: Provides HMAC signing functions using SHA256 and SHA512 algorithms.

pkg/crypto/hmac/funcs_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for HMAC signing functionality.

pkg/crypto/hmac/hmac.go.purpose: Implements HMAC signature validation with clock skew allowance.

pkg/crypto/hmac/hmac_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for HMAC validation functions including clock skew and signature validation.

pkg/crypto/hmac/init.go.purpose: This file initializes a singleton instance of the HMAC structure with a configuration.
